txt.en: 'Have you yet been to the encampment of our brothers in the North Downs? Once fair Esteldín still serves us honourably even now as a base for our Rangers to train and prepare as the forces of Angmar pour down from the northern wastes.\n\n'Not that we don't need your help here, but you may wish to speak with Nethúr in Esteldín -- I've heard that matters there have become quite dire as the Orcs encamp in ever greater numbers and threaten to overwhelm our people.'

'Calenglad sent you? Hah, and here I thought they might need your help even more than we - but it is true that matters here are not to my liking, for the Orcs outnumber our forces greatly, and it is only a matter of time before the last bastions of the North come under attack.'
'Nethúr at Esteldín will wish to speak with you, [placeholder].'
Calenglad of Tinnudir has bidden you speak with Nethúr of Esteldín in the North Downs concerning the Rangers of Esteldín and the Orkish forces pouring down from Angmar.
Nethúr is at Esteldín, far to the east of Evendim.\n\nCalenglad sent you to speak with Nethúr.
